articles.content: Apple (AAPL) rated Sell: overvaluation, slowing innovation, iPhone dependence, a weak AI strategy, and Vision Pro flop. Read here for more analysis.

articles.title: Apple Decouples From Nasdaq as AI ‘Whack-a-Mole’ Grips Market
articles.content: Its correlation with the benchmark has been on the decline since May, when it reached 0.92, as Apple’s decision to mostly sit out the AI arms race has turned it into an outlier compared with many of its rivals. A correlation of 1 means the two securities are moving in perfect unison, while a reading of -1 signals they are moving opposite each other.

articles.title: Apple stock selloff ’unwarranted,’ Wedbush’s Ives says
articles.content: Investing.com -- Apple’s recent share-price decline is “unwarranted,” according to Wedbush, which argued that investor concerns over potential delays to the company’s artificial intelligence rollout are overstated.

articles.title: Trade Tracker: Joe Terranova sells Apple
